alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 5:46AM EST until December 25 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Augusta. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water begins to flood parking lots on Front Street in Augusta. At 14.0 feet, Water reaches 2 feet deep in parking lots on Front Street in Augusta. At 15.0 feet, Much of the parking lot on Front Steet in Augusta floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:12 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 14.7 feet late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
